results.name: Number of length n 1..(1+2) arrays with no leading or trailing partial sum equal to a prime and no consecutive values equal.
comment: These are vectors [u_1 ... u_n] such that
Conjecture: There are infinitely many n > 0 with a(n) > 0. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 27 2015
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1970
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, Jan 26 2015
